trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040GLASS_00212_DRAKE_000_000<tab>I understand that Master Gerolt has crafted a Zodiac glass for you. Should you misplace it, please do not hesitate to come to me.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040GLASS_00212_DRAKE_000_010<tab>You've lost your Zodiac glass? It just so happens that Master Gerolt crafted spares, which he bade me give to you as necessary.

TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040GLASS_00212_DRAKE_000_011<tab>It's very unlike him to be this giving, though I hardly need to tell you that. At any rate, here is your replacement glass. Please see that you do not misplace this one─you can never tell when Master Gerolt's generosity will run dry.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040GLASS_00212_DRAKE_000_020<tab>Oh dear, it would seem that your hands are full. I shall hold on to the glass until you have room for it.
